__e: Or we could go to the bank... close our accounts and cut them off at the source.
Access the accounts, get my money.
I know where every account is and who's owed what.
In intelligence all evidence is, of necessity, circumstantial, but Cross had bank accounts with considerable assets in Zurich, under the number 30-98-71.
Would you be able to tell if there was any activity on these accounts in the last 24 hours?
This is every account in every single one of them.
